channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

How "Beyond The Gates" is bringing a fresh approach to daytime drama
item.description: After a 25-year hiatus in new soap launches, the showrunners of "Beyond The Gates" are promising rich storytelling with diverse cast and crew.

item.title: WATCH: Rescued baby seal settles in at Connecticut aquarium
item.description: Chappy the seal is around 6 weeks old and has a new home at the Mystic Aquarium.

item.title: WATCH: A-Rod sinks half-court shot, winning student $10,000
item.description: Former baseball superstar Alex Rodriguez nailed the shot at a Bucknell University basketball game, and the payday went to a lucky student.

item.description: Federal workers are getting widely mixed messaging regarding who to listen to: Elon Musk or their federal managers.

item.description: An 18-year-old American student is suspected of throwing her newborn baby out of a third-floor hotel window, Paris prosecution sources told CBS News.
